data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Roberts, Clive D., Stewart, Andrew L. (2013): A review of the anglerfish genus Chaunax (Lophiiformes: Chaunacidae) from New Zealand and adjacent waters, with descriptions of four new species. Zootaxa 3620 (1): 89-111, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3620.1.4
